nodes.text: The Smartmed 2000 Integrated Med-systems were a type of medical equipment manufactured by Athakam Medtech. They costed 2,500 credits.

The Smartmed 2000 Integrated Med-systems were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Gadgets and Gear, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The weapon was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Dangerous Covenants, a 2014 supplement to the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying series published by Fantasy Flight Games.
